data.oai_dc:dc: Sex-linked microsatellite genotypes of phenotypically sexed offspring
Sex-linked microsatellite genotypes and phenotypic sex in a family from loc. 1 (Greece, Crete). Blue colors show male alleles at heterozygous loci. 0: null alleles
